html:
12.20.18  3:20 pm   Why is the video for just did a bad thing taking almost twice as long as the last few videos?

      Is it extra special?
12.20.18  2:44 pm   Hey don't even worry about my question. How bout you just vent your frustrations right here in whatever terms you'd like. Don't even worry about it
12.20.18  2:35 pm   do pedestrians always have the right of way?

12.20.18  2:34 pm   hi_ i try to recreate the songs i like by ear (drums bass,everything if i can) but i sometimes have a hard time figuring out the tempo and time signature. like in "we could just get high" or "i'm confused". and sometimes time signature changes in the middle and its more confusing. what do i do to understand time better
12.20.18  2:28 pm   what do i ask?
12.20.18  1:03 pm   Thoughts on uppercase letters?
12.20.18  11:03 am   What Happened to Malaysia Airlines Flight 370?

12.20.18  10:36 am   I love the rhythmic elements to your songs, they sound very deliberate and calculated. Do you have as much passion for interesting rhythms as you do for harmony?

      Or do you see it as all the same kinda thing
12.20.18  10:28 am   How does one balance the desire to be a well-rounded person with the desire to be the absolute best at a very specific thing
12.20.18  10:03 am   so what inspires you to make your vids?

12.20.18  8:48 am   Do you ever feel really proud of what you accomplish (productively, not destructively) during a manic cycle and it kinda takes away any lingering shame about having them in the first place?
12.20.18  7:46 am   Do you get satisfaction from answering questions, and if so why?
12.20.18  5:43 am   do you ever feel like half of the questions you are asked are just passive aggressive attacks?
12.20.18  5:35 am   how do you get better at something

12.20.18  5:19 am   what does 12 half steps mean in octave

listen
12.20.18  1:33 am   how do i keep my children away from the plutonium in my backyard
12.20.18  1:25 am   I want to ask you a pony question but I don't know anything about ponies. Where should I begin learning about ponies so I can ask you a pony question?
12.20.18  12:30 am   Was writing, recording and releasing "Just Did a Bad Thing" cathartic for you?
12.20.18  12:23 am   what do i tell friends when they are feeling sad?

12.20.18  12:11 am   Heya Bill. I think part of what makes your videos stand out is that you do a good job combining audible, visual, and textual interest, without overwhelming the viewer. So I was wondering, do you have a preferred means of receiving information, e.g., watching, hearing, reading, or all of the above?

12.20.18  12:06 am   When i think bill wurtz philosophy to me that means shorter goals till you get the job done. Was there an inspiration for that method to get shit done or was it something that you slowly cane to realize worked for you(and may too for all)?
12.19.18  11:26 pm   I've got free time for the next month-ish. Any way I could make your life/ work easier?
12.19.18  11:10 pm   are all your videos parts of a huge story?
12.19.18  10:47 pm   Have you really had this website since 2000?

12.19.18  10:46 pm   Hi Bill. I'm interested in music theory and I want to learn more about it (specifically about things like scales and chords etc.). How should I go about it? Should I do it at school if it means I can't do other subjects I enjoy like science and maths and my grades might suffer because I'm currently not very good at it? Are there YouTube channels I can learn it from? Should I read books? How did you obtain your knowledge of music theory? Sorry for so many questions. I like your videos a lot!
12.19.18  10:20 pm   how do i stop using the word "you" in my songs
12.19.18  9:50 pm   Why is it easier to answer written questions than those in a live interview?

12.19.18  9:38 pm   what's the lowest note you can sing?

      what's the lowest note you can comprehend?
12.19.18  9:24 pm   How to stop global bread epidemic?
12.19.18  9:03 pm   What was the bad thing you did?
12.19.18  8:36 pm   How to stop blaming others for my shortcomings?
12.19.18  8:29 pm   Do you think songs with meaningless lyrics are inferior?

12.19.18  8:17 pm   Have you ever considered not making videos to go along with your songs? If you start putting out a short non-music video every other week, we'll get a full song and a full video every two weeks, and you might have more free time.
12.19.18  8:08 pm   How many is life
12.19.18  8:08 pm   Do you feel like you constantly have to one up your past self when it comes to long projects?

12.19.18  7:57 pm   When is c g b d G/C

      and when is it a C9 without the third
12.19.18  7:39 pm   how to get over feelin guilty about something?? even if The Thing That Happened wasn't big deal and amends were made?
12.19.18  7:18 pm   are you releasing songs on google music before they release as a video
12.19.18  6:50 pm   what bad thing did you do?
12.19.18  6:47 pm   a video every month would be acceptable
12.19.18  5:59 pm   Can I stop my brother from thinking about suicide?
12.19.18  5:41 pm   How many questions have been asked on this site?
12.19.18  5:40 pm   what do you do when you don't feel appreciated?
12.19.18  5:39 pm   When would I analyze a chord as a slash chord instead of a chord with a single bass note and the appropriate extensions?
12.19.18  5:27 pm   Where's the video to go with just did a bad thing!?
12.19.18  3:18 pm   Are ducks evil?
12.19.18  3:02 pm   Do we have a free will

12.19.18  2:59 pm   We had a substitute in class today and he let us put down songs on a list and he would play them on a speaker. I put down "La de da de da de da de day oh." The substitute wouldn't play it because it "wasn't popular enough." Then all the kids started to laugh. Am I a loser?
12.19.18  11:55 am   do you prefer dark chocolate or milk chocolate
12.19.18  11:51 am   are you going to finish your music video for "Just Did a Bad Thing"
